english.segment1: Cause I know that you're alive. You came to fix my broken life. And I'll sing to glorify. Your Holy name, Jesus Christ
english.segment2: You bought my life with the blood. That you shed on the cross. When you died for the sins of men. And you let out a cry, crucified. Now alive in me
english.segment3: These hands are yours. Teach them to serve. As you please and I'll reach out. Desperate to see all the greatness of God. May my soul rest assured in you
english.segment4: I'll never be the same. No I'll never be the same. Cause I know that you're alive. You came to fix my broken life. And I'll sing to glorify. Your Holy name, Jesus Christ
english.segment5: You've changed it all. You broke down the wall. When I spoke and confessed. In you I am blessed. Now I walk in the light. In victorious sight of you
english.segment6: Fire fall down. Fire fall down. On us we pray. As we seek. Fire fall down. Your fire fall down. On us we pray
english.segment7: Show me your heart. Show me your way. Show me your glory
